archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.2.6a: a) applying pre-configured firmware interface settings (e.g. BIOS or UEFI) to restrict powerful functionality (e.g. to disable the boot menu or USB/DVD boot options)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
